cards.label: Physics Question 2
cards.context: A common JEE physics question on thermodynamics

data.question: A Carnot engine whose sink is at 300 K has an efficiency of 40%. By how much should the temperature of the source be increased so as to increase its efficiency by 50% of its original efficiency?

cards.context: A common JEE physics question on optics

If now a ball is drawn at random from the bag, then the probability that this drawn ball is red, is:
